article.class: clearfix post-7 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.p: Swan River School is a unique, rural school, tucked away in the picturesque mountains of Bigfork, Montana. We strive to educate the whole child while focusing on the individual needs of every student. Our school fosters a caring and creative learning environment; and we equip our students to be successful in academics, as well as good stewards of humanity.
Please see the following attachment regarding the cancellation of the 2020 School Board Trustee election: Election Cancellation 2020
Click here to read the resolution of intent to impose an increase in levies in 2020.
School elections are coming up and people wishing to serve on a school board have until March 26, 2020 to
